description:
These jack-of-all-trades pants are ready for adventures. The abrasion resistant fabric stands up to gritty rock scrambles and the DWR finish sheds light rain. With an articulated fit and a hint of spandex in the mix, they're made to move. And with 8 (yes 8!) pockets, you'll have enough room to bring everything with you.

  • Made of abrasion resistant and breathable DURALUX™ nylon that has the soft hand feel of cotton
  • DWR finish resists water and speeds drying time
  • Fabric provides UPF 50 sun protection from harsh UV
  • Gusseted crotch and articulated knees enhance freedom of movement
  • 8 pockets give you storage options: 2 front hand pockets, 2 back, 2 side zippered and 2 side drop in
  • Elastic drawcord in bottom hem lets you cinch it up
name: Kuhl Renegade Rock Pants - Men's
